rooms.name: entrance_hall
rooms.description: Entry area with a small foyer and wheelchair-accessible ramp.

rooms.name: living_room
rooms.description: Spacious living room with Vastu-compliant layout, open space for gatherings.

rooms.name: dining_room
rooms.description: Dining area positioned in the northeast corner as per Vastu, with ample natural light.

rooms.name: kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen designed with ease of movement and wheelchair access; includes an adjacent pantry.

rooms.name: bathroom
rooms.description: Wheelchair-accessible bathroom with grab bars, near the entrance for safety.

rooms.name: garage
rooms.description: Car garage with space for two vehicles and a separate storage area.

rooms.name: library
rooms.description: Cozy library placed in the northwest corner as per Vastu, with built-in shelves and seating.

rooms.name: home_office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office near natural light, designed for accessibility with adjustable furniture.

openings.description: Large balcony adjacent to the living room, ensuring natural light and ventilation.
Each bedroom on this floor has a dedicated, wheelchair-accessible balcony for fresh air.
Wheelchair accessible ramp integrated with stairs leading to the next level.

rooms.name: master_bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with a private balcony and walk-in closet, designed for accessibility.

rooms.name: bedroom_2
rooms.description: Second bedroom with dedicated balcony and en-suite bathroom.

rooms.name: bedroom_3
rooms.description: Third bedroom with a spacious balcony and walk-in closet.

rooms.name: bedroom_4
rooms.description: Fourth bedroom with accessible design and private balcony.

rooms.name: ensuite_bathroom
rooms.description: Wheelchair-accessible ensuite bathroom for one of the bedrooms.

openings.description: Accessible staircase with handrails and a ramp to ensure safe movement between floors.
